emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of two men, including groom Howard Hairston, and two women, including bride Madelyn Moorer Cole Hairston wearing corsage on shoulder and fingerless gloves, posed in St. James AME Church, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1956, pg. 16, reads: "Bachelor Takes Wife - Howard Hairston and his bride, the former Madelyn Moorer Cole, are the picture of happiness as they pose for the photographer following their wedding at St. James AME Church. - Teenie Harris Photo."
